full_summary:
# EZ899-240220: Invitation to Qualify for HVAC Unit Replacement Contract

## Contract Information

### Title
Title: EZ899-240220
French Title: Remplacement du CVCA

### Reference and Solicitation Number
Reference Number: WS4074115778-Doc4092015127
Solicitation Number: WS4074115778

### Tender Status
Status: Closed

## Contract Details

### Description
This contract is for the installation, maintenance or repair of air conditioning units.

### Notice and Tender Information
Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Contact Person: Bryan Kelly
Contact Email: [Kelly.Bryan@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA](mailto:kelly.bryan@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: BC

## Contract Requirements

### Delivery
* Deliver to: British Columbia

### Notice URL
Notice URL: [Ariba Discovery Website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16865277?extsite=MTY4NjUyNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
